name: PDF Header Plugin
description: Adds a header to a PDF from a URL with custom text, font size, and color.
author: Dharmil Shah

parameters.name: PDF URL
parameters.description: The URL of the PDF to which you want to add a header.

parameters.name: Header Text
parameters.description: The text you want to add as a header.

parameters.name: Font Size
parameters.description: Font size for the header text.

parameters.name: Font Color
parameters.description: Font color for the header text (hex code).

outputs.name: PDF with Header URL
outputs.description: The URL of the new PDF with the header added.
